entry.title: RT Sam Williams 🐘: Arweave processed a 53 GB block over the weekend. Is that the largest block of on-chain data storage ever? It was also heavily d...
entry.summary: RT Sam Williams 🐘 Arweave processed a 53 GB block over the weekend. Is that the largest block of on-chain data storage ever? It was also heavily deflationary. It took ~$250 of AR out of circulation for hundreds of years, while minting just ~$30. https://viewblock.io/arweave/block/933396
